summary: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.
cast: Hudhail Al-Amir|Lloyd Avery II|Angela Bassett|Miya McGhee|Lexie Bigham|Kenneth A. Brown|Nicole Brown|Ceal|Morris Chestnut|Darneicea Corley|John Cothran|Ice Cube|Na'Blonka Durden|Susan Falcon|Jessie Lawrence Ferguson|Tyra Ferrell|Laurence Fishburne|Dedrick D. Gobert|Cuba Gooding Jr.|Regi Green|Kareem J. Grimes|Tammy Hanson|Valentino D. Harrison|Desi Arnez Hines II|Baha Jackson|Dee Dee Jacobs|Kirk Kinder|Meta King|Regina King|Leanear Lane|Nia Long|Whitman Mayo|Donovan McCrary|Don Nelson|Jimmy Lee Newman|Malcolm Norrington|Alysia Rogers|Esther Scott|Leonette Scott|Vonte Sweet|Baldwin C. Sykes|Raymond D. Turner|Yolanda 'Yo-Yo' Whittaker|John Singleton
keywords: gangsta|walking on train tracks|dead body|african american protagonist|violence
title: Los chicos del barrio
